title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6654.8 - Views of participants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6654.8 - Views of participants

State Regulations

Each service provider must develop and implement procedures
to obtain the views of program participants about the services they receive. Copies of records of such views shall be maintained for at least five program
years and shall be available to the area agency for inspection upon
request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6654.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
